message: Let's split the money 60/40.  This offer benefits you more as time goes on, so it's a good deal for both of us.
I understand the time pressure, but a 60/40 split isn't fair to me.  How about we meet closer to the middle with a 55/45 split? This ensures we both benefit significantly from this opportunity.
Bob, the value decreases rapidly for you. Let's be pragmatic.  My 60/40 offer was fair, this is a compromise considering the time pressure.
